definitions.definition: used as a formal and polite way of speaking to a man, especially one who you are providing a service to or who is in a position of authority:
examples: Would you like to see the menu, sir?

definitions.definition: sometimes used by children to address or refer to teachers who are men:
examples: Can I go to the toilet, sir?

definitions.definition: used after the name of a man, especially one who is in a position of authority, in order to be polite or show respect:
used to begin a formal letter to a man whose name you do not know. "Dear Sirs" is an old fashioned way of beginning a letter to a company.
used to begin a formal letter when you do not know if the person you are writing to is a man or a woman
